claims.claim: PANDA has successfully predicted hundreds of failures before they happen
claims.quote: PANDA is used to actively monitor thousands of components, and has helped the USAF successfully predict hundreds of failures before they happen.

claims.claim: The system has scaled to monitor more than 3,000 aircraft across 16 aircraft platforms
claims.quote: Today, the toolkit has scaled to monitor more than 3,000 aircraft across 16 aircraft platforms.

claims.claim: PANDA makes more accurate predictions about needed repairs and replacement parts, reducing over-maintenance and increasing aircraft readiness
claims.quote: Since the USAF deployed PANDA in AWS GovCloud (US), it makes more accurate predictions about needed repairs and replacement parts, reducing over-maintenance and increasing aircraft readiness.

claims.claim: Machine learning models have accelerated the time it takes to extract, analyze, and act on relevant maintenance data
claims.quote: Using ML models has accelerated the time it takes to extract, analyze, and act on relevant maintenance data.

claims.claim: PANDA supports more than 775 active users across eight mission applications
claims.quote: PANDA is built on the C3 AI Platform and C3 AI Readiness, and is comprised of eight mission applications that support more than 775 active users.

claims.claim: More aircraft are ready for flight as a result of the predictive maintenance solutions
claims.quote: Most importantly, with the use of predictive maintenance solutions provided by C3 AI and AWS, more aircraft are ready for flight and the USAF can focus on what's most critical – the defense mission.
